title: [Gameplay] Chroma Skins not working when I play Team Builder.
body: Okay so, I go into Team Builder solo queue, pick a champion, click the skin card and change to the chroma color only to later find out that in game, it's just the skin without the chroma. But in a normal match it shows up. What gives? It's been like this for me for months.

replies.body:
Hey Toxic Monarch,

We're aware of this issue and are working to resolve it. (It's not a 100% repro case, which is why it's taking a bit longer than we'd like. D:)
